test_binary_LSTM module¶

This script loads a trained BiLSTM model and evaluates its performance on test data for binary user authentication using mouse dynamics. It includes metrics such as AUC and EER, and generates confusion matrix plots.

Author: Karthik Godugolla Date: May 2025

test_binary_LSTM.binary_test(splits, n, model_path='./')¶
test_binary_LSTM.grouping(y, n, outs)¶

Groups predictions by user ID to calculate user-level authentication metrics.

Parameters:

  • y (np.ndarray) – Array of true user labels.

  • n (int) – Number of users.

  • outs (np.ndarray) – Model output predictions.

Returns:

(ys_all, preds_all) where both are lists of grouped true labels and predicted probabilities.

Return type:

tuple

test_binary_LSTM.train_test(path='./')¶

Continuos-Authentication-Using-Mouse-Dynamics-Behavioral-Biometrics
